behaviors.title: Fail-closed validation rejects empty strings, zero hashes, oversized collections
Intent digest cryptographically binds the specific effect; zero-hash rejected
Freshness witness tick must be strictly positive
Each AJC authorizes at most one side effect (linear consumption)
Consumption after AJC expiry must be denied
Lifecycle ordering: join < revalidate <= consume <= effect
Consume verifies exact intent digest equality (Law 2)
Consume denies if revocation head has advanced since AJC issuance (Law 4)
Fail-closed deny taxonomy: unknown authority state always maps to denial
Replay-critical bindings: time_envelope_ref and ledger_anchor non-zero on denial
Authoritative bindings require all fields populated and valid
Receipt time_envelope_ref equals authoritative_bindings ref when both present
Permeability and delegation chain hashes must both be present or both absent
Temporal arbitration evaluator tuples sorted by strictly increasing evaluator_id
Temporal deadline miss escalates transient disagreement to persistent
Temporal arbitration receipts are Ed25519-signed; tampered receipts fail
String fields bounded by MAX_STRING_LENGTH (256); collections by MAX 64
